long_description: The Patagonia Meridian Board Shorts perform in or out of the water for all-day, all-summer comfort and style. Soft, stretch-woven all-recycled polyester/spandex blend with color-blocked options. Elasticized back waistband for ease of wear; self fly gusset with flat-tie closure for secure fit. Zippered side pocket with internal key loop; mesh pocket liner drains water. Forward inseams on the Patagonia Meridian Board Shorts help prevent chafing; side slits at hem improve mobility.
